raw_comment: The graph shows is what months the leaves start to grow back in each region of the U.S. I noticed that the Southernmost area of the U.S. is getting leaves earlier in the year than in the further north states and that the graph doesn't show Hawaii or Alaska. I wonder what the different colors represent.
ace_sentences: The graph shows in which months the leaves start to grow back in each region of the U.S.
I noticed that the southernmost area of the U.S. gets leaves earlier in the year than the states that are further north.
The graph does not show Hawaii.
The graph does not show Alaska.
I wonder what the different colors represent.
